description: This boy´s father had good connections so he managed to get him a really sweet job for someone fresh out of school. Our guy worked as a manager of a small hotel and obviously he was terrible at it. It was such a bad experience that he decided to leave his home town and move to Prague to start a new life. He wanted to build his career without anyone´s help. And he wasn´t doing a bad job. I have to admit, I liked the guy. Not only as a sex object but also as a person. I decided to give him a chance and offered him a managerial position once again. I thought he was ready for it. Too bad he wasn´t ready to pay our mediation fee. So I gave him another proposition. I would pay the fee and he would even make some extra money. He just had to do what I wanted. Everything.
title: Dirty Scout 124
